title: Waistcoat, late 18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White silk waistcoat embroidered in polychrome silks in the style of Jean-François Bony.

Waistcoat, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk
